title: Data form
description: A form to display data in

name.description: Display name for this column header in a localized form.

enableSort.description: If true, this column can be sorted. Default is false.

align.description: The alignment of the column items. Default is left.

hidden.description: If true, this column is a hidden column. Default is false.

labelProp.description: If defined, label items based on a given property (rather than their name).

sortOnDataPropertyName.description: If defined, sort items based on a given property (rather than their name).

edit.description: If defined, this field is editable

editOrder.description: Order of the field in edit dialog
